articles.author: Lucas Tomlinson, Nick Givas
articles.title: Pentagon to extend availability of 4 military bases to help with coronavirus efforts: official
articles.description: The Pentagon on Saturday extended the availability of four military installations to act as temporary housing through March 15 in an effort to help the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) manage the novel coronavirus, now known as COVID-19.
articles.content: The Pentagon on Saturday said it will extend the availability of four military installations to act as temporary housing through March 15 in an effort to help the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) manage the novel coronavirus, now known as COVID-1… [+1953 chars]

articles.title: China ousts top Communist Party officials amid outrage over coronavirus response
articles.description: China has been hobbled by the mysterious coronavirus that emerged in the central city of Wuhan; the ruling Chinese Communist Party is taking aggressive measures to regain control of the situation.

articles.author: Gerren Keith Gaynor
articles.title: Quarantined cruise ship passenger speaks out against US coronavirus evacuation plan
articles.description: Matthew Smith tells Fox News' Neil Cavuto that he and wife prefer to stay on Diamond Princess ship.
articles.content:
A passenger aboard the Diamond Princess cruise ship, which is currently quarantined off the coast of Japan amid a coronavirus outbreak, is speaking out against the United States’ plan to evacuate American passengers.
Matthew Smith, who has been quarantined w… [+3032 chars]

articles.author: Greg Norman
articles.title: France reports Europe’s first coronavirus death
articles.description: An 80-year-old man in France has become the first person in Europe to die from the coronavirus.
articles.content:
An 80-year-old man in France has become the first person in Europe to die from the coronavirus.
The man – a Chinese tourist from the province of Hubei – arrived in France on Jan. 16, then was hospitalized on Jan. 25 under strict isolation measures. His condi… [+1682 chars]

articles.author: Brie Stimson
articles.title: US coronavirus plan would evacuate some Americans from quarantined cruise ship in Japan: report
articles.description: Hundreds of Americans quarantined on a cruise ship docked off the coast of Yokohama, Japan, for more than a week due to a coronavirus – now called COVID-19 -- outbreak onboard will have the chance to evacuate, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention sa…

articles.author: Louis Casiano
articles.title: China reports drop in new coronavirus cases, death toll tops 1,500 in country
articles.description: China reported a major drop in new coronavirus cases Saturday to 2,641, a decline after Chinese officials began implementing measures to contain the illness, and a slight increase in new deaths to 143.
articles.content:
China reported a major drop in new coronavirus cases Saturday to 2,641, a decline after Chinese officials began implementing measures to contain the illness, and a slight increase in new deaths to 143.
